lines.text: It seems you have a wonderful, loving family.
Ha! The last time I felt anything like love from this family it turned out to be gas.
I would never tear down this house! I have such fond memories of growing up here.
Really dad, like what?
Like, uh, well, the time I... well, they've escaped me at the moment.
Where are your parents?
Who knows, probably somewhere bumping uglies.
You drive a hard bargain.
Well, I'm not my father's daughter for nothing.

[to her grown child]
"You were a load I should've swallowed!"
[Antoinette puts her foot in David's crotch under the dinner table, David looks up in surprise]
How's your meat?

[chewing food]
Um... hard.
Maybe I should tenderize it for you.

[unaware]
Did I overcook?
[the voices of the now-undead Gargoli family taunts Kelly as she enter the kitchen and sees the pot on the stove. Kelly lifts the cover and, in sheer horror, sees the head of David]
Hi, Kelly. Want some soup? Made it myself!
[Kelly slams the cover down, then turns to see an undead Granny]

[distorted]
With a little help from me!
[chuckles]
Glad you could join us, sweetheart.
[Granny cackles loudly as Kelly runs into the dining room where we see the mutilated and gruesome undead members of the Gargoli family having a "family dinner"]
Kelly, my dear. Nice to see you. Join us, won't you?
She really doesn't have much choice, dose she?
[the undead Granny brings out a covered dining tray]

[distorted]
Treats for the sweets!
[Granny lifts the cover as we see the head of David; The family cheers and laughs]
Hi, everybody!
What is this, prime rib?
[take a big bite of his meat]
I love it!
Mmm! Wonderful soup.
Thank you.
They say that the family that eats together...
...stays together.
[throws a piece of meat at both Tyrus and Granny]
You know something? Y'all make me sick!
[Amy blows a raspberry]
You little brat! Well, what are you waiting for, you jugheads? Go get her!
